about_the_game:
MAN ABANDONED GOD

SO GOD ABANDONED MAN

AND ANOTHER TOOK HIS PLACE

CATACLYSM: Even Angels Sin's soundtrack at the highest possible quality. It is heavily recommended to not listen to the soundtrack until you have completed the most recent content for the game.

For best listening experience, navigate to your Steam Client's Settings -> Music menu, and select "Download high-quality audio files" for lossless quality.
